Data_bs.label_en: Short-term deposits, not classified as cash equivalents
Non-current assets classified as held for sale
Long-term deposits not classified as cash equivalents
Long-term trade notes and accounts receivable
Investments accounted for using equity method
Current portion of long-term debt and debentures
Liabilities included in disposal group classified as held for sale
Equity attributable to the owners of the Company

Data_is.label_en: Gain on investments in joint ventures and associates, net
Profit (loss), attributable to owners of parent
Basic earnings (loss) per share from continuing operations
Basic earnings (loss) per share from discontinued operations
Basic earnings (loss) per share - preferred stock
Basic earnings (loss) per share - preferred stock from continuing operations
Basic earnings (loss) per share - preferred stock from discontinued operations
Diluted earnings (loss) per share - preferred stock

Data_cis.label_en:
Items that will not be reclassified subsequently to 
profit or loss
Profit (loss) on financial assets measured at FVOCI, net
Other comprehensive income, net of tax, gains (losses) on remeasurements of defined benefit plans
Changes in retained earnings of equity-accounted investees, net
Changes in share of OCI of equity-accounted investees, net

Data_cis.label_ko: 후속적으로 당기손익으로 재분류될 수 있는 항목
Data_cis.label_en:
Items that may be reclassified subsequently to 
profit or loss:
Loss on financial assets measured at FVOCI, net
Gains (losses) on cash flow hedges, net of tax
Share of other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method, net of tax
Gain on foreign operations translation, net
Comprehensive income attributable to shareholders of the Company
Comprehensive income attributable to non-controlling interests

Purchase of property, plant and equipment
Purchase of intangible assets
Acquisitions of investments in joint ventures and associates
Net Cash Flows from Investing Activities due to Changes in the Scope of Consolidation

Proceeds from short-term borrowings
Increase in long-term borrowings and bonds

Long-term borrowings and redemption of bonds
